records.Name: Member Card
records.Description__c: A KQED member card that allows the user access to KQED Events

records.Name: KQED Program
records.Description__c: A viewer guide that has a schedule of the TV shows that are on KQED's TV stations

records.Name: Pledge Free Stream
records.Description__c: Access to KQED's Pledge Free Stream that allows viewers to accees KQED's radio station without any pledge breaks

records.Name: Passport
records.Description__c: Provides extended access to an on-demand library of quality public television programming online
